title: Мошенники крадут товары, выдавая себя за ПСК и Ozon
title_translated: Fraudsters steal goods posing as PSK and Ozon
summary: Fraudulent attacks targeting well-known companies, using forged documents and phone number substitution to make purchases. Scammers posed as representatives of legitimate organizations, showing powers of attorney and seeking shipment of goods.

title: В веб-ресурсах 26% компаний нашли веб-шеллы ещё до запуска сервисов
title_translated: In web resources, 26% of companies found web shells before the launch of services
summary: Web shells were detected on 26% of Russian companies' websites, services, and applications in the first half of 2025. The most alarming increase is seen on external sites and public web resources, with a rise from 12% to 53%. Developers often open access to test or unfinished services, making systems vulnerable.

title: Новый macOS-вредонос с подписью Apple Developer заменяет Ledger Live
title_translated: New macOS malware signed by Apple Developer replaces Ledger Live
summary: A new version of malware for macOS was found, which managed to bypass Apple's protective mechanisms and pretend to be an update to GoogleMeet. The malware has been reported to steal data, linger in the system, and execute malicious scripts. It also includes basic protection against analysis.

title: В России готовят запрет на зарубежные коммуникационные сервисы
title_translated: Russia is preparing a ban on foreign communication services
summary: The Russian government plans to introduce additional restrictions on the use of communication services and software from unfriendly countries before September 1, 2025. This is a measure in response to restrictions imposed by other states.

title: Минцифры предлагает предоставлять отсрочки ИТ-специалистам без дипломов
title_translated: The Ministry proposes to provide delays to IT specialists without diplomas
summary: The Ministry proposes to expand the list of IT specialists who can defer from conscription in the army, allowing young professionals to build a career in IT without interruption.

title: Вышла САКУРА 2.36: поддержка ARM и улучшения для VPN и AD
title_translated: Sakura 2.36: ARM support and improvements for VPN and AD
summary: Optimization and acceleration: The release includes corrections for errors found in previous versions.

title: Golden dMSA: доступ к защищенным ресурсам AD через взлом контроллера домена
title_translated: Golden dMSA: Accessing Protected AD Resources by Hacking a Domain Controller
summary: Semperis experts discovered a serious flaw in Managed Service Accounts (dMSA) project, allowing permanent access to all resources in Active Directory domains. The vulnerability simplifies password cracking and enables horizontal movement between domains.

title: Роскомнадзор обсуждает с маркетплейсами проверку сим-карт
title_translated: Roskomnadzor discusses with marketplaces the verification of SIM cards
summary: Roskomnadzor and marketplaces are discussing introducing mechanisms to check SIM cards used by migrants, aiming to prevent fraud using other people's numbers.
